description: Prepare a Mediterranean-inspired feast for four in just 20 minutes with this pesto chicken and mashed cauliflower recipe.
keywords: Mains,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,High protein,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Cauliflower
name: Easy Pesto Chicken With Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Prep Set Go frozen Mediterranean roasting mix

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken in a ceramic dish. Spoon over pesto and turn to coat.
Heat 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Cook chicken for 5 minutes on each side or until cooked. Transfer to a plate.
Increase heat to high. Add vegetables to pan, then cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until cooked.
Heat mash according to packet instructions. Slice chicken. Divide mash among plates. Top with vegetables and chicken to serve.
